name: Central NY Spiritual Association Leaflet (IAPSOP)
content:
Central NY Spiritual Association Leaflet (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Central NY Spiritual Association Leaflet Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Central N.Y. Spiritual Association's Leaflet. All things are ready come.—Matt. 22.4 1897 Monthly Freeville, NY. 1/1, January 1897. This was the journal of the Central New York Spiritual Association, designed primarily to promote its camp at Freeville in Thompkins County. 1/1 in the NSAC library at Lily Dale. Issues:Leaflet V1 N1 Jan 1897
